entry.title: Purple bag - Trendy Backpack with Custom Design -
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printify
Type: Bags
Price: 68.00

Elevate your daily adventures with this stylish and versatile backpack. Crafted from durable fabric, it features a sleek design that perfectly combines functionality and aesthetics. The padded back and adjustable shoulder straps ensure comfort, whether you’re commuting to work, heading to school, or exploring the outdoors. With multiple compartments, including a dedicated laptop sleeve and easy-access front pocket, organization is effortless. Ideal for students, professionals, and travelers alike, this backpack complements any lifestyle. Perfect for back-to-school season, travel getaways, or everyday use, it adds a pop of personality to your routine while keeping essentials secure and within reach.

Product features
- 100% durable polyester fabric that retains shape and is quick-drying
- Padded back and straps for excellent comfort and breathability
- Four compartments, including a spacious main zip pocket and dedicated laptop sleeve
- Durable zipper closures for easy access and secure storage
- Lightweight design with adjustable straps, assembled in the USA

Care instructions
- Before cleaning the bag, remove all the items from the bag. Suggested to pretreat visible stains with stain remover. Mix warm water with laundry detergent and clean the bag with terry washcloth or soft bristle brush. Let the bag air dry.

entry.title: MRM - Logo - Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printify
Type: Bags
Price: 48.70

Introducing a stylish and functional Weekender Bag that is perfect for your weekend getaways or daily errands. This spacious bag brings a sense of adventure and excitement, making every outing feel special. With its chic design, it fits seamlessly into the lives of busy professionals, students, or anyone who loves to travel in style. Ideal for holidays, vacations, or spontaneous trips to the beach, this bag is a must-have accessory for anyone on the go. Its trendy aesthetic not only elevates your look but also provides practical functionality for all your essentials.

Product features
- 100% spun polyester ensures a wrinkle-free exterior that looks sharp and polished.
- Long, durable rope handles made from cotton allow for easy carrying and a stylish flair.
- Generous dimensions of 24" x 13" make it perfect for packing all your travel necessities.
- The cream sheeting interior lining offers a sleek finish and is made from a comfy cotton-polyester blend.
- Manufactured in the USA with globally sourced components, ensuring quality craftsmanship.

Care instructions
- Before cleaning the bag, remove all the items from the bag. Suggested to pretreat visible stains with stain remover. Mix warm water with laundry detergent and clean the bag with terry washcloth or soft bristle brush. Let the bag air dry.

entry.title: MRM Backpack Logo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printify
Type: Bags
Price: 49.99

This stylish backpack is the perfect blend of functionality and modern design. Made from 100% lightweight polyester, it’s extremely durable, retaining its shape and drying quickly after use. The padded mesh back panel and adjustable shoulder straps ensure comfort for all-day wear, making it ideal for students, professionals, or anyone on the go. With multiple compartments, including a spacious main zip pocket and a dedicated slot for a laptop or tablet, it provides excellent organization for all your essentials. Perfect for school, work, travel, or outdoor adventures, this backpack adds flair to any outfit and is suitable for gifting during holidays, back-to-school season, or as a thoughtful present for birthdays or celebrations.

Product features
- 100% durable polyester fabric that retains shape and dries quickly.
- Padded back panel and straps for maximum comfort and breathability.
- Multiple compartments including a main zip pocket, front pocket, and a side bottle pocket.
- Secure zipper closures for easy access and safe storage of belongings.
- Lightweight and assembled in the USA with globally sourced materials.

Care instructions
- Before cleaning the bag, remove all the items from the bag. Suggested to pretreat visible stains with stain remover. Mix warm water with laundry detergent and clean the bag with terry washcloth or soft bristle brush. Let the bag air dry.

entry.title: Men's Sandals,
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printify
Type: Shoes
Price: 49.99

Step into style and comfort with our sleek Men's Sandals. Designed for the modern individual, these sandals provide the perfect balance of functionality and chic aesthetics. The embossed insole ensures a secure grip, making them ideal for all-day wear, whether you're at the beach, lounging by the pool, or exploring the city. The removable straps allow for versatility, enabling you to easily switch styles for any occasion. Crafted from lightweight materials, they are easy to wear and quick-drying, making them perfect for summer adventures. Ideal for beach lovers, vacation-goers, and anyone looking to enhance their casual footwear collection, these sandals make an excellent gift for birthdays, Father’s Day, or just because. Feel the freedom with every step and embrace your personal style!

Product features
- Embossed insole for secure and comfortable grip.
- Designed with foot curvature for all-day wear.
- Removable straps for style versatility.
- Lightweight cushioned sole and quick-drying materials.
- Available in black & white outsole color options.

Care instructions
- Remove straps from soles. Machine wash straps on warm. air dry. Hand wash soles with dish soap. Re-attach straps when dry.

entry.title: Dad’s Slippers
entry.summary:
Vendor: Printify
Type: Shoes
Price: 0.99

Step into comfort with these cozy Men's Indoor Slippers. Crafted from soft flannel fleece, they provide a warm and snug fit that feels like walking on clouds. Perfect for lounging at home, they bring a sense of relaxation and style to any indoor setting. Ideal for men who appreciate comfort and quality, these slippers are great for cozy evenings, holidays, or just a casual day at home. They make fantastic gifts for occasions like birthdays, Father’s Day, or even as a thoughtful present for the holidays, ensuring loved ones stay warm and stylish.

Product features
- Made from 100% polyester flannel fleece for softness and durability.
- Anti-slip textured outsole ensures better grip and comfort.
- Features a removable insole for easy cleaning and drying.
- Crafted with a polyester outer-layer and lining for lasting quality.
- Stylish black rubber sole adds durability and a modern touch.

Care instructions
- To maintain clean, use warm water with dish soap to clean off any dirt spots. It’s not necessary to soak the whole item. For hard-to-clean spots, use a soft-bristled brush.
